content.rendered:
Valorant is 5v5 fpp shooting game designed by a American Company Riot Games.

This game is a mix of CS:GO and Apex Legends as it has a game mechanism of CS:GO and having a pinch of salt as it has a abilities of each of its characters just like Apex Legends.

                                                              Character in Valorant

Right now there are 13 characters in game.

Namely:-

1:-Phoenix 2:-Reyna 3:-Omen 4:-Sage 5:-Jett 6:-Raze 7:-Breach 8:-Viper 9:-Brimstone 10:-Skye 11:-Cypher 12:-Killjoy

These characters have abilities of their own each of them have 4 abilities. Of which 3 are which you can buy from the money you get and and the last ability is your ultimate ability which is appoint based ability i.e. you get it  when you either get a kill defuse the bomb or finish a round.

                                                                  Basics Of Game 

Now, coming to the basic of the game is:-

  1. You select a 5 man team or get a random match.
  2. You select you agent your love to play or want to play.
  3. You either get defender side or attacking side.
  4. In attacking side you get the bomb and you have sites where you have to plant and defend site until bob explode so you win a round or you kill all defenders player.
  5. In defending side you have to defend the sites either you kill all attacking side player or you defuse the bomb before exploding.
  6. The first team to get the point i.e. you win 13 times you win the game.
  7. And after wining you get a rank up and if you loose you derank

                                                       Ranks In Valorant

  1. Bronze
  2. Iron
  3. Gold
  4. Platinum
  5. Diamond
  6. Immortal
  7. Radiant

                                          Tips For Playing Valorant

The easiest way to play valorant like pro is you first play deathmatches and spike rush game to know the basics and mechanism of the game . Also you don’t have to worry about rank you can play uncompetitive matches where there is nor rank system and ocne you know the game start playing all agents and then pick one which you are comfortable with and then grind it perfectly and just hop into games and start winning those matches and get you perfect rank 😉
